    Insert string

    str_insert.Rd

    Useful for inserting periods in icd9 codes when they come without.

    str_insert(x, pos, insert)

    Arguments

    x

    a character or character vector

    pos

    what position in the string to insert

    insert

    what to insert

    Value

    icd code with a period

    Contents

    Developed by Louisa Smith, Rob Cavanaugh.
